column1: 8. Percentage of the type of house and/or lot households intend to buy in the next 12 months2

column2: A quarterly survey conducted by the Department of Economic Statistics
Starting Q2 2018, the questionnaire was enhanced to include buying intention on house and/or lot for the next 12 months.

column1: Due to the implementation of the Community Quarantine nationwide, the conduct of the Q2 2020 CES was cancelled.
